title: How the humble marigold outsmarts a devastating tomato pest

title_detail.value: How the humble marigold outsmarts a devastating tomato pest

summary: Researchers carried out a study to prove what gardeners around the world have known for generations -- marigolds repel tomato whiteflies.

summary_detail.value: Researchers carried out a study to prove what gardeners around the world have known for generations -- marigolds repel tomato whiteflies.
